channel.title: INTERVIEWS on Opinionated Guides

item.title: Interviews
item.description: List of published Interviews # Loial Otter If you would like to be interviewed # Well, first of all I’d like to know what makes you interesting - so shoot me a message or open an issue on github.

item.title: Loial
item.description: 9/23/2018 Introduction: I’m Matthew or LoialOtter, a crazy person up in western Canada who likes to make stuff. I work at Kron Technology as an engineer mainly in FPGA, electronics design and hardware design. I don’t have any credentials except a certificate in baking and pastry arts. I’m self-taught mostly due to not being ever able to afford going to school. I suggest others do when the have the opportunity but it isn’t absolutely required.
